flavorText:
"I have wept such a torrent as to scour the land clean."
—Mu Yanling

foreignData.flavorText:
„Ich habe eine Flut aus Tränen geweint, um das Land reinzuwaschen."
—Mu Yanling
foreignData.name: Flut aus Tränen
foreignData.text: Bringe alle bleibenden Karten, die keine Länder sind, auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück. Falls du auf diese Weise vier oder mehr bleibende Karten, die du kontrollierst und die keine Spielsteine sind, auf deine Hand zurückbringst, kannst du eine bleibende Karte aus deiner Hand ins Spiel bringen.

foreignData.flavorText:
"El torrente que lloré podría bañar la tierra entera".
—Mu Yanling
foreignData.name: Inundación de lágrimas
foreignData.text: Regresa todos los permanentes que no sean tierra a las manos de sus propietarios. Si regresas de esta manera cuatro o más permanentes que no sean fichas que controlas, puedes poner una carta de permanente de tu mano en el campo de batalla.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Mes larmes ont formé un torrent capable d'assainir la terre. »
—Mu Yanling
foreignData.name: Déluge de larmes
foreignData.text: Renvoyez tous les permanents non-terrain dans les mains de leurs propriétaires. Si vous renvoyez au moins quatre permanents non-jeton que vous contrôlez de cette manière, vous pouvez mettre sur le champ de bataille une carte de permanent de votre main.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ho versato un fiume di lacrime così impetuoso da ripulire completamente la terra."
—Mu Yanling
foreignData.name: Profluvio di Lacrime
foreignData.text: Fai tornare tutti i permanenti non terra in mano ai rispettivi proprietari. Se fai tornare in questo modo quattro o più permanenti non pedina che controlli, puoi mettere sul campo di battaglia una carta permanente dalla tua mano.

foreignData.flavorText:
「私の涙の激流は地面をきれいに洗い流すほどだったわ。」
――ムー・ヤンリン
foreignData.name: 涙の氾濫
foreignData.text: 土地でないすべてのパーマネントをオーナーの手札に戻す。これによりあなたが、あなたがコントロールしていてトークンでない４つ以上のパーマネントを戻したなら、あなたはあなたの手札にあるパーマネント・カード１枚を戦場に出してもよい。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Já chorei o suficiente para lavar a terra."
— Mu Yanling
foreignData.name: Inundação de Lágrimas
foreignData.text: Devolva todas as permanentes não de terreno para as mãos de seus donos. Se devolver quatro ou mais permanentes não ficha que você controla dessa forma, você poderá colocar um card de permanente de sua mão no campo de batalha.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Я пролила столько слез, что их поток мог бы очистить землю».
— Му Янлин
foreignData.name: Наводнение Слез
foreignData.text: Верните все перманенты, не являющиеся землями, в руки их владельцев. Если таким образом вы возвращаете не менее четырех не являющихся фишками перманентов под вашим контролем, вы можете положить карту перманента из вашей руки на поле битвы.

foreignData.flavorText:
「我暗自神伤，泪河涌注，只为能涤净这片大地。」
～沐燕灵
foreignData.name: 泪如泉涌
foreignData.text: 将所有非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。如果你以此法移回四个或更多由你操控且非衍生物的永久物，则你可以将一张永久物牌从你手上放进战场。

foreignData.flavorText:
「我暗自神傷，淚河湧注，只為能滌淨這片大地。」
～沐燕靈
foreignData.name: 淚如泉湧
foreignData.text: 將所有非地永久物移回其擁有者手上。如果你以此法移回四個或更多由你操控且非衍生物的永久物，則你可以將一張永久物牌從你手上放進戰場。

name: Flood of Tears
originalText: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. If you return four or more nontoken permanents you control this way, you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: If you return four or more nontoken permanents, the permanent card you put onto the battlefield may be one of the cards returned to your hand this way.

Any abilities that trigger as the nonland permanents are returned are put onto the stack at the same time as any abilities that trigger as the permanent card is put onto the battlefield (if applicable).

If a permanent would be returned to your hand but ends up in another zone (most likely because an effect exiled it instead or because it's a player's commander in the Commander variant) Flood of Tears counts it when determining whether four or more of your nontoken permanents were returned.

text: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. If you return four or more nontoken permanents you control this way, you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
